quotes.quote: You see, what I hate more than anything is a liar. A charlatan. Someone who doesn't believe in what they say.

quotes.quote: I'm trying to say this from a constructive place. I can feel your negative vibrations from across the room, man.

quotes.quote: My name is ASAC Schrader, and you can go f*ck yourself.

quotes.quote: Sometimes we need to lose something before we can understand its value.
quotes.author: Linda Martin

quotes.quote: You know, joining each other at crime scenes, bantering over dead bodies. And where does that leave you, right?
quotes.author: Ella Lopez

quotes.quote: I prefer lust over love. It's a little less complicated and a lot more fun.
quotes.author: Lucifer Morningstar

quotes.quote: The most evil of people have the most normal names, Ive experienced

quotes.quote: Sometimes Betrayal Come From The Ones We Expect The Least.

quotes.quote: We might not always understand it, but God has a plan.

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it
